group_1.textCenter: (Compared to before, she has no hesitation.@What happened in such a short time...?)

group_1.textRight: [surround:1016A05][chara:102300:effect_7003_damage02][bgEffect:shakeLarge]!
[surround:1023A01][chara:102300:effect_7000_attack01]I'm not scared of that anymore,@because I'm not the same me～

group_1.textLeft: Huff...
A peaceful world without exploitation and a world where people can accept each other as equals peacefully.
You're still the same as me,@naively wishing for such a future.
However, your heart is still in disarray.

group_1.textRight: I feel it's more like I've finally gotten over my fear@and made an amazing transformation.
Kinda like using a hidden command@to enter invincibility mode?
[surround:1023A03][chara:101600:effect_7001_attack02]Now I feel like I can make anything happen!

group_1.textLeft: [surround:1016A01][chara:102300:effect_7000_attack01]Hiding behind your delusions,@that only leaves you vulnerable!

group_1.textRight: [surround:1016A05][chara:102300:effect_7002_damage01][bgEffect:shakeSmall]Ughー
Ugh...huff...@It's okay, don't be afraid...don't be afraid...!

group_1.textLeft: Having no fear of death or pain@is no proof of becoming stronger!

group_1.textRight: It's not about me getting stronger.@It's about me getting over it.

group_1.textLeft: Don't tell me, something happened when@the [textYellow:Kimochi] swallowed you up...?
No one came to the ventilation opening.@It's different from what I had heard...

group_1.textRight: What's up?

group_1.textLeft: Urara, who are you waiting for here?

group_1.textRight: All the Mikazuki Villa girls.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, Iroha's group is coming.
Huh? You mean you knew they were coming?

group_1.textRight: Other members confirmed movement@at the old trainyard and Kamihama Prison,
so that just leaves Mikazuki Villa.

group_1.textLeft: You can't possibly mean to fight alone?@Isn't that dangerous...?

group_1.textRight: I'm just here to make sure no one's coming.
If they don't show up like the eldest is expecting,@then Felicia's having a hard time at the moment.

group_1.textLeft: ...Um, I also heard the story about Felicia,
but was it that necessary to hurt her so much...?

group_1.textRight: We knew that the Union wanted to rush an attack.
Since we did, I think it's only normal for us to want@to reduce their strength.
Ignoring the options available to us I feel would be strange.

group_1.textLeft: So you did that to her so everyone would be late...?

group_1.textRight: I feel sorry for her, but it was too good of a strategy...
Is it alright if I ask you a question now, Kagome?

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Sure...

group_1.textRight: I get that you're doing interviews@to spread the story about Magical Girls,
but how exactly are you planning on spreading it?

group_1.textLeft: That's impossible for me to do alone, right?
First, I'm doing interviews and setting them@to photos and words,
but Nemu is arranging the articles.
Then Touka will send it out to the world.
So you see, with the help of those around me,@I think it can be possible.
And then, Mr. Tasuke Satomi,@Miss Nayuta's father will...
W-w-w-w-wha...?
<Suddenly attacking me,@what is the meaning of this!?>
*Gasp*...ugh...

group_1.textRight: What are you planning on making the professor@do...?
[chara:103600:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]!?
Ahー That's my bad!
It was just an emotional outburst,@I hope you'll forgive me!

group_1.textCenter: (If Rii was still incomplete, I could have been killed...)
(Aside from that, Urara's reaction just now...)
(That means she knows Miss Nayuta's father,@doesn't it?)
(I heard that he even stopped by Futatsugi,)
